(Program 
  (Statement 
    (ExpressionStatement 
      (Expression 
        (CallExpression 
          (Expression 
            (MemberExpression 
              (PropertyIdentifier "someMethod") 
              (Expression 
                (Identifier "object")))) 
          (Arguments 
            (Expression 
              (Identifier "arg1")) 
            (Expression 
              (String))))))))
